Generated Narrative: ValueSet gridhamd-answer-options-vs-q16

  • Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
    CodeDisplay
    Q16/1-1No weight loss
    Q16/1-2Probable weight loss
    Q16/1-3Definite weight loss
    Q16/2-1Less than 1 lb. (.5 kg) loss per week since last visit
    Q16/2-21-2 lb. (.5 – 1 kg) loss per week since last visit
    Q16/2-3More than 2-lb (> 1 kg) loss per week since last visit
